Translations.Text: vaastav mein, aagyaakaaree log svargon tatha sroton mein honge
(unase kaha jaayega) isamen pravesh kar jao, shaanti ke saath nirbhay hokar
aur ham nikaal denge unake dilon mein jo kuchh bair hoga. ve bhaee-bhaee hokar ek-doosare ke sammukh takhton ke oopar rahenge
na usamen unhen koee thakaan hogee aur na vahaan se nikaale jaayenge
(he nabee!) aap mere bhakton ko soochit kar den ki vaastav mein, main bada kshamaasheel dayaavaan[1] hoon
aur meree yaatana hee duhkhadaayee yaatana hai
aur aap unhen ibraaheem ke atithiyon ke baare mein soochit kar den
jab ve ibraaheem ke paas aaye, to salaam kiya. usane kahaah vaastav mein, ham tumase dar rahe hain
unhonne kahaah daro nahin, ham tumhen ek gyaanee baalak kee shubh soochana de rahe hain
usane kahaah kya tumane mujhe is budhaape mein shubh soochana dee hai, tum mujhe ye shubh soochana kaise de rahe ho
unhonne kahaah hamane tumhen saty shubh soochana dee hai, atah tum niraash na ho
(ibraaheem) ne kahaah apane paalanahaar kee daya se niraash, keval kupath log hee hua karate hain
usane kahaah he allaah ke bheje hue farishto! tumhaara abhiyaan kya hai
unhonne uttar diya ki ham ek aparaadhee jaati ke paas bheje gaye hain
loot ke gharaane ke siva, unasabhee ko ham bachaane vaale hain
parantu loot kee patni ke lie hamane nirnay kiya hai ki vah peechhe rah jaane vaalon mein hogee
